SENT.plain: The case of a patient who came to the Nuclear Medicine Department for a bone scintigraphy to rule out bone metastasis because of a lung neoplasm is presented
Some days before, the patient had suffered a right brain infarction
99mTc-MDP uptake could be seen in the infarction area
Different mechanisms of 99mTc phosphates deposition in tissues other than bones are reviewed in this article
